original_text: When the morning comes, the priest must dress himself in his linen clothes. The linen must be next to his skin. He must take the ashes from the fire and he must put them at the side of the altar.
korean_text: 제사장은 세마포 긴 옷을 입고 세마포 속바지로 하체를 가리고 제단 위에서 불태운 번제의 재를 가져다가 제단 곁에 두고

sentences.original_text: the priest must dress himself in his linen clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 자신의 아마 옷을 입어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The linen must be next to his skin
sentences.korean_translation: 아마는 그의 피부에 바로 붙어 있어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: He must take the ashes from the fire
and he must put them at the side of the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 제단 옆에 두어야 합니다
